sentence: Traditionally, dessert banana plants and local wild beach flora such as " Scaevola taccada " and " Ipomoea pes-caprae " were used as humidity-supplying green undergrowth for coconut trees, mixed with sea almond and sea hibiscus.

positive_examples.sentence: Ripe fruits and fruit parts including blackthorn (sloe berries), " Aronia " chokeberry, chokecherry, bird cherry, rhubarb, quince and persimmon fruits, and banana skins are very astringent; citrus fruits, like lemons, are somewhat astringent.
